comments.body: Was the previous type too strict?

Yes, the `elem?: ElementHandle` part is incorrect.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/404765/31690263-d6c3b93a-b357-11e7-9180-d52fb4b5351d.png)

The `args` that will be passed to `pageFunction` are of type `Serializable|ElementHandle`.

`Serializable` is an `any` and the previous code locked it to only `ElementHandle`

It also returns a `Serializable` / `any`

https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pageevaluatepagefunction-args
